name: Gifts For Satan
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare gamejam in 48 hours in December 2018.

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/gifts-for-satan

You are in control of sending offerings to Satan. Press the space bar and send them off before Satan gets too mad!

Villagers will eat carrots to become Soldiers.

Soldiers will rack up demon kills and become more powerful!
